version_description:
• New and enhanced text tool with support for multiline text, alignment options and bounding box sizing
• New brush tool
• Performance improvements

• New brush tool

+ Completely new transform tool which allows for arbitrary rotations
+ Improved crop UI
+ Fresh new design
+ More stickers
+ Updated focus tool. It uses a box blur now and the gradient can be adjusted
+ Bugfixes

We've added support for wide color displays to our editor. If you are using an iPhone 7 you now get to edit your photos with even more colors.
